Title.evidence: The clinicopathologic findings in Burkitt lymphoma (BL) and diffuse large B-cell lymphoma (DLBCL) may show significant overlap and MYC abnormalities, found in all BL, also occur in a subset of DLBCL.

Trial_Design.evidence: a phase 3 randomized study of standard immunochemotherapy versus autologous stem cell transplant.

Intervention.evidence: a phase 3 randomized study of standard immunochemotherapy versus autologous stem cell transplant.

Number_Randomised.evidence: we identified 260 cases of non-Burkitt, diffuse aggressive B-cell lymphomas

Result_Outcome.evidence: MYC positive cases were morphologically and phenotypically heterogeneous and were associated with poor progression-free and overall survival in multivariate analysis.
